name: 42 Lisboa
description: Programming school founded in 2013 in Paris and has schools in more than 20 countries. The teaching methodology is totally innovative with practical projects, group learning, earning points and helping colleagues. I learned to solve problems, to search for solutions effectively and in a team, i exercised my creativity and became more technically qualified.

name: Alura
description: Biggest online technology school in Brazil. It has courses in several areas, my learning focus was on Front-End Development. I learned many concepts of programming logic, Front-End, frameworks, supersets and libraries. Take a look at my certificates from the courses i have taken and see my knowledge bases.

name: Curso em VÃ­deo
description: Online classes on Youtube with professor Gustavo Guanabara about basic knowledges of Python 3 such as functions, arrays, tuples, dictionarys, modules, error tratements, conditions, types and operators. Take a look at my repository on GitHub below and see the exercises that i did using my learnings.

name: UFF
description: At Universidade Federal Fluminense (UFF) I studied until the 4th period of Production Engineering. I dropped the course because I couldn't see a carrer progress in this area, my focus is 100% on programming. I learned many concepts about Agile Methodologies, administration of companies and also learn a little bit of C++.

name: CLAC
description: CLAC is an extension project of the Faculty of Letters of the Federal University of Rio de Janeiro and aims to promote language courses for the community, providing a space where UFRJ Letters graduates practice teaching in a reflective, conscious and qualitative way. , under the guidance of the professors of this institution.
